section.5: The Book of Mosques and Places of Prayer

hadiths.text: A'isha reported:The Messenger of Allah (ï·º) used to observe the morning prayer, and the women would go back wrapped in their mantles being unrecognisable because of the darkness before dawn. (Ishaq b. Musa) al-Ansari (one of the transmitters in this chain of narration) narrated" wrapped" (only) in his narration. (No mention was made of mantles)
